publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-296.2 Mr John Swinney: Modernisation of the Scotish Economy—As an amendment to motion (S1M-296) in the name of Henry McLeish, leave out from "encourage" to end and insert "will create new wealth and sustainable employment but regrets that these ambitions will be difficult to realise due to the absence of macro-economic powers from this Parliament." Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Brian Adam*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Alex Neil*
